HOME.TITLE: Home
HOME.TEXT1: Here you can show full report about all members in this sheet
HOME.TEXT2: Begin using the application by adding a new Member
HOME.TEXT3: Then you can Add new Entry

CREATE_MEMBER.TITLE: New Member
CREATE_MEMBER.NAME: Member Name
CREATE_MEMBER.NOTES: You can specify a User that represents this Member

ERRORS.MEMBER_NAME_BADINPUT: Only letters or numbers, max 32 charachters
ERRORS.USER_NOT_FOUND: No User found with this email
ERRORS.USER_IS_ALLREADY_MEMBER: This User is already member in the sheet

DELETE_MEMBER.ALERT_TEXT: Are you sure you want to delete this member?
DELETE_MEMBER.CANNOT_NON_ZERO_BALANCE_MEMBER: Can't Delete a Member who has non zero balance

DELETE_ENTRY.ALET_TEXT: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?

ERRORS.CREDITOR_IS_DEBETOR: You must select another member too!

ERRORS.DUPLICATED_SHEET_NAME: Sheet Name is Duplicated, Please choose anthor name

ALERT.DELETE_PERMISSION_CONFERMATION: Are you sure that you want to delete with user permission on this sheet?

ADD_PERMISSION.TITLE: Add Permission
ADD_PERMISSION.NOTES: Here you can add permission on this sheet to other users
ADD_PERMISSION.NOTES2: Please enter user email and permission type
ADD_PERMISSION.PERMISSION_TYPE_READ_DESC: Can view your sheet, but can't add or delete its data
ADD_PERMISSION.PERMISSION_TYPE_FULL_DESC: Can do whatever with your sheet, except deleting it

ERRORS.USER_HAS_PERMISSION: User has a permission already, if you want to change his permission, please remove his current permission, then add your desired permission
